name.en: Where There's a Will, There's a Way Out
name.ja: <ruby>仇<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>すれば<ruby>通<rt>つう</rt></ruby><ruby>図<rt>ず</rt></ruby>

text.en: During the Main Phase: The turn player can excavate cards from the top of their Deck up to the number of cards their opponent controls, and if they do, they add 1 excavated card to their hand, then they place the rest and 1 card from their hand on the bottom of the Deck in any order. This effect of "Where There's a Will, There's a Way Out" can only be used once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if the turn player excavated 9 cards or more with this card's effect this turn: They can activate this effect; shuffle all cards on their opponent's field and GY into the Deck.
